member.name: T:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes
member.summary: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) must inherit.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes.Create
member.summary: Creates a cryptographic object that is used to perform the symmetric algorithm.
member.returns: A cryptographic object that is used to perform the symmetric algorithm.
